DOC.brief_summary: Endotracheal intubation commonly teach perform patient supine . Recent literature suggest elevate patient 's head upright position may decrease peri-intubation complication . However , little data success rate upright intubation emergency department . The goal study measure association head position intubation success rate among emergency medicine resident .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Upright Patient Positioning Intubation Success
DOC.detailed_description: Endotracheal intubation commonly teach perform patient supine . Recent literature suggest elevate patient 's head upright position may decrease peri-intubation complication . However , little data success rate upright intubation emergency department . The goal study measure association head position intubation success rate among emergency medicine resident . Study design prospective observational study . Residents perform intubation record angle head bed , number attempt require successful intubation record faculty respiratory therapist . The primary outcome first past success calculate respect three group : 0-10 degree ( supine ) , 11-44 degree ( incline ) , â‰¥45 degree ( upright ) ; first past success also analyze 5 degree angle increment .
DOC.criteria: Adult medical intubation intubate resident supervise faculty consent study participation . Pediatric patient Obstetric patient Trauma patient
